author: sky.cactus
content: Idea for an invoker: Uniswap sequencer.  You submit your transaction to the sequencer and it will batch it with a bunch of other transactions and give you guarantees of ordering by time without sandwichers.  Maybe even limit orders where it gives you best possible price in next block or something.

author: sky.cactus
content: Sequencer would operate via Proof of Benevolence, meaning you can identify when they are cheating and stop using them if they ever cheat, and you can still put limits on the orders so even if they cheat their gains are limited.
